translation.en: [man 1] She used to come here every time she came.
translation.zh: ‎过去她每次来的时候都会到这里

translation.en: First port of call.
It was a still, calm night like now.
translation.zh: ‎那是个像今天一样平静的夜晚

translation.en: Flat calm and cold.
If you coughed, you could hear it across the harbour.
translation.zh: ‎咳嗽一声的话 港口另一头都会听到

translation.en: Just like literally like this.
[reporter 1] Gardaí are treating as suspicious
the death of a woman whose body has been found
translation.zh:
‎这个在科克南海岸郡的偏远地区
‎被找到的女尸

translation.en: in a remote area in County Cork on the southern coast.
[reporter 2] It's one of the most idyllic hideaways in the mountains of West Cork.
translation.zh:
‎这是西科克山上
‎最风景如画的地方之一…

translation.en: There is very little crime of any type.
translation.zh: ‎几乎没有发生过任何类型的犯罪

translation.en: [reporter 3] It's a vast area with many isolated locations.
translation.zh:
‎这是一片很大的区域
‎有很多孤立的地点

translation.en: [reporter 4] The murder is the first here in living memory.
translation.zh: ‎这起案件是这个地方有史以来第一个

translation.en: [man 1] She'd sit up there, have her tea and scones.
translation.zh: ‎她坐在那里吃着司康饼 喝着茶

translation.en: [chuckling] The funny thing was, I speak a bit of French,
translation.zh: ‎有趣的是 我会说一点法语

translation.en: and any French person I see, I'd be out there talking to them,
translation.zh:
‎在外面看到的任何法国人
‎我都会和他们说话

translation.en: 'cause if you don't use it, you lose it.
translation.zh:
‎因为如果不把握机会
‎你就失去了机会

translation.en: And she felt the same about English.
She'd try and speak English to me.
[chuckles] And I'd insist…
I wouldn't insist.
And practice my French with her.
[woman 1] Don't let people into your home. Ring the Gardaí immediately.
translation.zh:
‎别让别人进你家
‎立刻给爱尔兰卫队打电话

translation.en: The brutal murder has shocked the public.
[reporter 6] The international dimension gives it an added mystique.
translation.zh:
‎因其具有国际性
‎所以案件更具有神秘性

translation.en: France has been gripped by this case.
[reporter 7] Just how a woman could be murdered
in probably the safest place in Ireland beggars belief.
translation.zh: ‎而且是在爱尔兰可能是最安全的地方

translation.en: Around Christmas time, we'd have a night for the locals in the pub, you know?
translation.zh:
‎大概在圣诞节的时候
‎我们会到一间为当地人开设的酒吧

translation.en: Sandwiches and sausage rolls
or finger food type thing.
And I asked her would she come, and she said she would.
translation.zh: ‎我问她来不来 她说她会来

translation.en: But then, no, she left
and didn't come, obviously.
She was a beautiful French lady that came off-season,
translation.zh:
‎她是个美丽的法国女人
‎她是淡季的时候过来的

translation.en: and she doesn't come anymore.
[reporter 3] The murder has attracted scrutiny from France.
I think that justice will be done.
[reporter 3] It has become a modern Irish murder mystery.
translation.zh:
‎这个案件已经成为
‎现代爱尔兰的一个谋杀谜团

translation.en: [reporter 4] The government set up a special inquiry.
[reporter 5] …she walked out of court, refusing to answer questions.
translation.zh: ‎…她走出法庭 拒绝回答任何问题

translation.en: [reporter 8] What's important now is the truth.
[woman 2] It would not be appropriate for the government to comment.
We have made mistakes.
[anchor 1] All of this has implications for all of us.
translation.zh: ‎这一切都影响着我们所有人

translation.en: [reporter 5] It was the case that goes to the heart of our democracy.
translation.zh: ‎这起案件挑战着我们民主的核心

translation.en: [reporter 9] This is a murder, which unless solved, won't be forgotten.
translation.zh:
‎这是一场实实在在的谋杀案
‎人们永远无法忘记 除非案件告破

translation.en: [man 1] The only reason I'm involved
is because I was the last person spoke to her.
translation.zh: ‎是因为除了在我之后见过她的人

translation.en: Except whoever saw her after me.
translation.zh: ‎我是最后一个跟她说话的人

translation.en: [man 2] Two days before Christmas
at the Garda station, police station,
I got a phone call from West Cork.
A local lady had discovered a body,
translation.zh: ‎一名当地女士发现了一具尸体

translation.en: and a team was required to go to the scene.
It was definitely unusual.
We were unsure of what we were travelling down to.
To get down to West Cork,
all the major towns we travelled through had Christmas traffic.
translation.zh: ‎我们经过的所有主要城镇 ‎都因为圣诞节而堵车

translation.en: It would have taken four and a half to five hours.
It was in a very remote area.
Very, very difficult to get to.
A town which was called Schull.
translation.zh: ‎我们到了一个叫斯卡尔的地方

translation.en: [man 3] I remember when we learned about it.
translation.zh: ‎我记得 当我们听说这个案件的时候

translation.en: I was working with a news agency here in Cork.
translation.zh: ‎我当时在科克当地的一家媒体工作

translation.en: A call came in at ten to two from one of our contacts.
translation.zh:
‎一点五十的时候
‎我们接到一位联系人的电话

translation.en: I jumped in my Fiesta and headed to West Cork.
translation.zh:
‎我跳上我的福特嘉年华
‎赶往西科克

translation.en: Even though I'm from Cork, I took the wrong route.
translation.zh:
‎尽管我是科克人
‎但我还是走错了路

translation.en: I went through Bandon, Clonakilty, and Skibbereen,
translation.zh:
‎我路过了班登 克洛纳基尔蒂
‎和基伯林

translation.en: so I met every traffic jam in the place.
[reporter 10] Gardaí in County Cork are treating as suspicious
the death of a woman whose partly clothed body was found this morning
translation.zh: ‎在遥远的斯卡尔发现的女士

translation.en: in a remote area near Schull.
[Barry] I arrived in Schull.
Even when I was given directions how to find it,
it took me half an hour to 40 minutes to find the house.
translation.zh:
‎但是我还是用了30、40分钟
‎才找到房子

translation.en: It's really isolated.
The road leading to Sophie's house, it's a side road
off a small country road.
It is quite sinuous around bends,
then you clear one shoulder of rock and see the house in the distance.
translation.zh:
‎透过外露的石头
‎你可以看到远处的房子

translation.en: I got as far as that.
The area was cordoned off well back from the murder scene.
translation.zh:
‎这个区域因为谋杀
‎很久以前就被封锁了

translation.en: There was a local journalist, Ian Bailey,
translation.zh: ‎当时有一个当地的记者伊恩·贝利

translation.en: who'd cover crime, familiar with forensics and so forth.
translation.zh:
‎他负责案件报道
‎和法医等人员也相熟

translation.en: He'd done some work for The Southern Star, a local paper in West Cork.
translation.zh: ‎他在西科克当地的《南星周报》工作

translation.en: I'd never heard of him. He was the first journalist at the scene.
translation.zh:
‎我从没听说过他
‎他是现场的第一位记者

translation.en: [Ian] I, as the local correspondent or stringer,
I was known to various papers, and I had a call from The Cork Examiner,
translation.zh:
‎我认识很多报社
‎我接到了《科克考察家》的电话

translation.en: and they gave me basic details
and asked me to go out and make some inquiries.
I was talking to the neighbours up there, "Have you heard anything?"
translation.zh: ‎我同周围的邻居聊天 ‎“听见过什么声音吗？”

translation.en: There was obviously a huge amount of interest in this.
translation.zh: ‎显然 很多人对这个案件感兴趣

translation.en: [anchor 2] I'm joined by John Farrelly of the Garda Press Office.
translation.zh:
‎我现在在和爱尔兰新闻办公室
‎约翰·法雷利连线

translation.en: What can you tell us about the death of this woman?
translation.zh: ‎您能和我们讲讲这个女人的死亡吗？

translation.en: [John from device] She was discovered this morning around 10:00 a.m.
translation.zh: ‎她是早上十点左右被发现的

translation.en: At the moment, the Gardaí are at the scene.
The body is still there, so details are quite sketchy at this moment.
translation.zh:
‎尸体还在那里
‎目前没有更多的细节信息

translation.en: We're still waiting for the arrival of our ballistics and forensics people
translation.zh: ‎我们在等待弹药专家和法医

translation.en: from Garda Headquarters to examine the scene.
[Eugene] We arrived in Schull at about 10 p.m.,
translation.zh: ‎我们是晚上十点左右到达的斯卡尔

translation.en: found the local Garda station,
and it was closed.
They were out at the scene.
We went to a local telephone box.
translation.zh: ‎我们去了一个当地的电话亭

translation.en: The phone had been vandalised,
so I had to rewire the phone,
contact the local guard
to show us where it was.
It was a full moon,
it was a clear sky.
Cold, just slightly above freezing.
When we got to the scene,
the body was lying in the grass verge,
dressed in white night attire,
attached to barbed wire at the edge of the field.
translation.zh: ‎尸体被固定在球场边缘的铁网上

translation.en: The body had been on the roadside a long time,
a minimum of 12 hours.
I can still see it now.
It's as clear today.
She had defence wounds from holding her hands up.
translation.zh: ‎她的手是举起来的 手上有防御伤

translation.en: Possibly, a lot of the wounds could have happened from the vegetation,
translation.zh:
‎可能还有更多的伤
‎可是是被路上的荆棘

translation.en: the briars or from the loose gravel on the roadway.
[sighs] She had severe head and facial injuries,
a severe brain injury,
and crushed skull…
from a heavy object.
There was a concrete block at the scene, yes.
translation.zh: ‎现场有一个水泥块 没错

translation.en: I can still see it.
[man 4] Let's get the hell out of here.
[anchor 2] Any idea roughly how long this woman has been dead?
translation.zh: ‎你知道这个女人大概死了多久吗？

translation.en: [John from device] Absolutely not.
That's one of the aspects the pathologist will be looking at
and the formal identification, which…
We'll have to wait until that takes place before we can release any more details.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须等到结果下来
‎才能放出更多信息

translation.en: [anchor 2] John, thank you.
John Farrelly of the Garda Press Office on the discovery of a body…
translation.zh:
‎爱尔兰卫队署的约翰法雷利
‎发现了这个尸体

translation.en: [Eugene] At that time, we would have known her identity,
translation.zh: ‎那时我们已经知道她的身份了

translation.en: which included that she was French.
[in French] In Ireland, the body of a young French woman in her thirties
translation.zh:
‎爱尔兰发现了一具
‎三十多岁法国女人的尸体

translation.en: was discovered today in County Cork.
The victim, partially clothed and suffering head wounds…
translation.zh: ‎被害人衣冠部分完整 头部有伤

translation.en: [woman 3 in English] We are a very close family, yes.
That's true.
Very close, yes.
[in French] I said, "It can't be Sophie
because she spoke to her husband the night before."
translation.zh: ‎因为她前一天晚上刚和丈夫谈过了”

translation.en: [man 5] We were asking, "Have you heard from Sophie?"
"No, I know she's in Ireland."
translation.zh: ‎“没有 我只知道她在爱尔兰”

translation.en: "She left on Friday."
"I don't have any news, but that's not unusual."
translation.zh: ‎“其他我不知道 不过这也不稀奇”

translation.en: I called Sophie's house,
and no one answered.
-Of course, then things got tense. -[phone continues ringing]
Could it be Sophie?
We were 90% sure that it couldn't be her.
translation.zh: ‎我们有九成把握 这不是她

translation.en: "Please, it's not Sophie."
And then we had some more information on the location,
that it was in West Cork.
Naturally, then we started to worry.
[Georges] We were listening to the TV news,
and they didn't give the name of the place where it happened
or the… the victim's name,
and we… we didn't know,
but Marguerite said, "Oh, it's Sophie."
[Marie-Madeleine] "But, Marguerite, how many women visit from France at Christmas?"
translation.zh:
‎“可是 玛格丽特 有多少法国女人
‎从法国来过圣诞节？”

translation.en: [in English] Immediately, she feels it's Sophie.
[in French] I called Josephine, Sophie's neighbour.
translation.zh: ‎我给苏菲的邻居约瑟芬打电话

translation.en: I tried ten, 15 times, but she was always busy…
translation.zh: ‎我打了10次、15次 但她总是占线

translation.en: …until I managed to get hold of her,
and I still remember vividly
translation.zh: ‎我依然生动地记得当时的场景

translation.en: Josephine screaming in my ear.
I didn't understand anything she was saying
between her accent, the shouting,
and… and maybe the emotion.
Uh, until I cut her off by asking her, "Is it Sophie or not Sophie?"
translation.zh: ‎直到我问她“到底是不是苏菲？”

translation.en: That's when she said, "It's Sophie."
And there, your world turns upside down.
We were stunned, all of us.
A bit lost.
We had to tell Pierre-Louis,
who was on holiday with his dad.
[Pierre-Louis] I was 15 years old on 23rd December 1996.
We were preparing for Christmas.
My dad came and told me
in the middle of the night.
He woke me up to tell me.
And, well, the… the shock, uh…
it's like an electric shock, very powerful.
I was a little boy, an only child.
I was extremely close to Mum
translation.zh: ‎我的父母在我一岁的时候离婚了

translation.en: because my parents divorced when I was one.
So for a very long time,
I lived with my mum during the week.
translation.zh: ‎我在一周内都是和妈妈住在一起

translation.en: We were very close. Yes, very close.
It was a sudden transformation
from childhood to adulthood.
When she died,
a little part of all of us crumbled.
translation.zh: ‎我们所有人心中的一个角落崩溃了

translation.en: [reporter 11 in English] It's trying to make contact with her family in France
translation.zh:
‎有一个问题就是
‎和她法国的亲人取得联系

translation.en: to… to break the news.
[man 6 from device] That's right. That was done.
Uh, it's particularly gruesome at this time of year,
coming up to Christmas,
that we have to give this kind of news to anybody.
translation.zh: ‎我们需要把这个消息告诉别人

translation.en: [reporter 11] It is a kind of blot on the landscape.
[reporter 12] People are wondering whether the region's first murder in living memory
translation.zh:
‎大家都在讨论这个地域上
‎第一桩谋杀案

translation.en: has meant that life there has changed forever.
translation.zh: ‎这也意味着 那里的生活永远改变了

translation.en: [woman 4] My great-grandfather came to Schull to be the station master
translation.zh: ‎我的曾祖父在18世纪初来到斯科尔

translation.en: in the 1800s.
translation.zh:
‎他当时是一名站长 ‎（弗洛伦斯·纽曼
‎斯科尔当地居民）

translation.en: [interviewer] You're Schull through and through.
Yes, I would consider myself so, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是的 可以这样说吧 嗯

translation.en: This area is very open-minded.
In coastal communities,
there's always an ebb and flow of new people coming in.
translation.zh: ‎总会有川流不息的新人涌入

translation.en: I think anything near the water keeps you fresh.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得水边的东西能让你保持清醒

translation.en: You can't become stagnant where there's an ocean outside your door.
translation.zh: ‎因为外面就是海洋 你不能停滞不前

translation.en: My parents used to bring us down here going back to the mid '50s.
translation.zh:
‎50年代中叶时
‎我父母经常带我们来这里

translation.en: I'm from Cork City originally.
We came down here with my wife and kids
translation.zh: ‎我们带着我的妻子和孩子来到这里

translation.en: and have been here ever since.
Bought this place in 1982,
translation.zh: ‎1982年 我们买下了这个地方

translation.en: the Courtyard,
and we sold 2004,
and many magical moments over the years.
translation.zh:
‎一起售出的还有
‎过去那些年的美好回忆

translation.en: [Wassell] The countryside is so ancient.
translation.zh:
‎（伊丽莎白·瓦塞尔
‎作家 斯科尔前居民） ‎这个乡下非常古老

translation.en: And West Cork is overlooked by Mount Gabriel.
translation.zh: ‎加布里埃尔山眺望着西科克

translation.en: All kinds of rumours, um, swirled around that.
[Len] We're the last house on Mount Gabriel.
translation.zh:
‎（伦恩·里皮赤
‎珠宝设计师 斯科尔居民） ‎我们是加布里埃尔山上的
‎最后一个房子

translation.en: There's about three ruins up the mountain, they're Famine houses, you know,
translation.zh: ‎山上大约有三处大饥荒时期的废墟

translation.en: where people used to live years ago.
translation.zh: ‎几年前 人们曾经在那里居住过

translation.en: You can just see the old ridges where they grew the spuds and stuff.
translation.zh:
‎你可以看到古老的山脊
‎人们曾在那里种植土豆和农作物

translation.en: There were people living further up the mountain,
translation.zh: ‎更往上的地方也有人居住过

translation.en: but there's no roads going up to the ones above.
There's a legend that the last wolf in Ireland lived there.
translation.zh:
‎有 个传说是爱尔兰的最后一匹狼
‎就生活在那里

translation.en: The local people grew up with the local legends and myths and lore.
translation.zh:
‎当地人是在当地传说、神话
‎和谜团中长大的

translation.en: It was mother's milk to them.
translation.zh: ‎这对他们来说是必不可少的

translation.en: [Peter] There's lots of standing stones and stone circles.
Great places, you know.
A lot of mythology.
A lot of the expat community had a very romantic feeling about Ireland.
translation.zh: ‎许多外地人 ‎都觉得爱尔兰充满了浪漫的感觉

translation.en: [reporter 13] West Cork has provided a peaceful, beautiful,
translation.zh: ‎西科克是一个平静美丽的地方

translation.en: and relatively anonymous escape for people of all nationalities
translation.zh: ‎将近三十年以来 所有人都觉得

translation.en: for almost 30 years.
Every third or fourth house would be a foreigner of some kind.
translation.zh:
‎每三或四个房子中
‎都会有一个外地人

translation.en: German or English or Dutch or French or…
translation.zh: ‎德国人、英国人、荷兰人、法国人…

translation.en: You know? It's not your regular parish community.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗？
‎这里和你常去的教区不一样

translation.en: [reporter 13] In fact, West Cork is regarded as an international
translation.zh: ‎事实上 西科克被认为是

translation.en: rather than an Irish region.
translation.zh: ‎一个国际化而非爱尔兰本地化的地方

translation.en: [Wassell] Yet the locals,
the people from the old families who were very traditional…
translation.zh: ‎家就在这里的本地人 非常传统…

translation.en: -[producer] Morning. -Good morning!
…who had lived in that place for centuries are very tolerant of the newcomers.
translation.zh:
‎…那些在此住了几个世纪的人
‎对外来人很宽容

translation.en: [man 7] If you're coming from a city,
translation.zh: ‎如果你是从英国或者欧洲来的

translation.en: from England or from Europe, they find they like it and end up staying.
translation.zh: ‎你会爱上这里 并定居下来

translation.en: It's a feel that the area has.
translation.zh: ‎这个地方有一种独特的感觉

translation.en: The locals called them crusties.
[chuckling] I would say, like, "the garlic eaters."
[Ian] Well, I first came to West Cork in 1986,
and it was just wonderful.
There I was in this rural idyll,
a sort of magnet for different nations, different people,
translation.zh: ‎它吸引着不同国籍、不同类型 以及

translation.en: different art disciplines.
[interviewer] So you're a "blow-in." Explain what that means.
translation.zh:
‎所以你是个“闯入者”
‎解释一下这是什么意思

translation.en: A blow-in's anybody that doesn't actually come from the place they're sitting in.
translation.zh: ‎闯入者是指生活在非出生地的人

translation.en: It's a description for somebody that wasn't born and raised there, I suppose.
translation.zh:
‎用来描述不在本地出生长大的人
‎应该是吧

translation.en: [Toma] I came here with my three children.
translation.zh:
‎我带着三个孩子来到这里 ‎（托玛·麦库林
‎艺术家 斯科尔本地人）

translation.en: A lesbian, so, you know, a bit of a thing at that time.
translation.zh: ‎我是个女同性恋 在那个时代 你懂的

translation.en: But, actually, it's a place that really welcomed us.
translation.zh: ‎但是在这里 人们非常欢迎我们

translation.en: I think people are desperate to find a safe, quiet place to live.
translation.zh:
‎我认为人们迫切地寻找
‎一个安全宁静的地方居住

translation.en: [Toma] There were lots of sets of blow-ins.
The blow-ins that were the artist community.
There were blow-ins that were yachties,
hippie dope smokers.
I suppose I was the… lesbian feminist blow-ins. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎我想我是女同性恋
‎女权主义者类的闯入者

translation.en: [Peter] Very artist-orientated.
So maybe that says something about sort of the type of people.
translation.zh: ‎所以这也表明了这里居民的一些特征

translation.en: People that think differently.
These were people drawn to the more rugged, wild West Cork lands.
translation.zh: ‎这些人被崎岖、狂野的西科克吸引

translation.en: The lost children of Europe.
We have a very determined team on this, an experienced team.
translation.zh: ‎我们有一支坚定且经验丰富的队伍

translation.en: The divisional officer would have been Chief Superintendent Noel Smith.
translation.zh:
‎当前的区长是
‎警务长诺埃尔·史密斯

translation.en: [Smith] This was a foul murder. This lady had obviously invested in this country,
translation.zh:
‎这是一起手段卑劣的谋杀案
‎这位女士无疑在这个国家受到了调查

translation.en: and it's terrible that she should be killed in this fashion.
[Barry] It would've fallen to Dermot Dwyer to lead the investigation in practical terms.
translation.zh:
‎实践方面由德莫特·德怀尔带领
‎进行案件调查

translation.en: Oh God. [grunts]
Wait a minute, now.
Take away the cup. [chuckles]
Now…
That was the first murder in West Cork for nearly 100 years.
translation.zh: ‎这是近百年来 西科克第一起谋杀案

translation.en: Where every murder investigation starts, you start with a clear mind.
translation.zh: ‎展开案件调查前 ‎需要有一个清晰的思路

translation.en: You have no preconceived ideas
because if you do, it's wrong.
translation.zh: ‎如果先入为主 你就错了

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -It's the evidence and the intelligence.
That's what directs you in a certain way.
[interviewer] Some people use this expression of you as "the Cork Columbo."
translation.zh: ‎有的人用“科克神探科伦坡”来形容你

translation.en: Listen, don't mind that. That's rubbish. If… if… if…
translation.zh: ‎听着 请别介意 那是垃圾 如果…

translation.en: Columbo was a well-paid man. I wasn't. End of story.
translation.zh:
‎…科伦坡收入可观
‎并不是 我说到这里就可以了

translation.en: [Eugene] An outdoor crime scene is a very difficult area
to get evidence left by the perpetrator.
There was one foot mark.
It was only an approximate shoe size, but that's all.
translation.zh:
‎只是一个寻常鞋码的脚印
‎没有其他信息

translation.en: We found blood on the field. We found it in two or three places.
translation.zh: ‎我们在地上发现了血迹 ‎我们在两、三个地方都发现了血迹

translation.en: [Eugene] There were bloodstains on the metal gate.
I had the gate removed as blood evidence.
translation.zh: ‎我把门作为血迹证据带走了

translation.en: The house was the next area we should be looking at.
There could have been an assault at the house.
There was nothing disturbed.
No broken cutlery, no broken anything.
translation.zh: ‎没有坏的餐具 没有任何坏的东西

translation.en: No sign of an assault or aggression.
I was very surprised.
Everything was neat and tidy,
where it should be.
The initial information was she was in the premises on her own.
translation.zh: ‎最初的消息说是她自己在房子里

translation.en: But there was two wine glasses.
Somebody may have come in.
The fingerprint expert would've taken whatever fingerprints was available.
translation.zh: ‎指纹专家会拿走所有能拿到的指纹

translation.en: But also, I was fascinated by her door keys
in the back of the lock.
The possibility was
she could have answered a knock on the door
and was inveigled out of the premises,
translation.zh: ‎然后被诱导 走出了房屋

translation.en: and the door closed behind her.
Then we moved upstairs.
The bedroom was most unusual
in that it had a raised bed as it used to be in all country houses.
translation.zh: ‎里面有一张乡下房子里都有的高架床

translation.en: She had requested a local carpenter do it for her,
and the lady didn't have curtains.
Because she was so enthralled by the Fastnet lighthouse.
translation.zh: ‎因为她很喜欢法斯特耐特灯塔

translation.en: She could read in bed sitting up with the lighthouse light flashing.
translation.zh:
‎她可以躺在床上看书
‎坐起来就可以看到灯塔

translation.en: [interviewer] Could someone have been watching her?
Oh, absolutely.
No doubt.
The fingerprint expert,
his results were negative.
There was no indication of other people in the premises.
We then focused on the possibility of DNA evidence.
Our forensic laboratory at the time was only starting to get a DNA system,
translation.zh:
‎我们的法医实验室是当时刚开始
‎搞DNA系统

translation.en: and you need a lot of physical evidence,
translation.zh:
‎为了得到DNA信息
‎需要很多的物理性证据

translation.en: near to a… a teaspoonful of blood,
translation.zh: ‎差不多需要一茶勺的血液才可以

translation.en: where in today's technology, two head hairs is now enough.
translation.zh: ‎而现在的科技 可能两根头发足以

translation.en: They found nothing there.
It all transpired 'twas hers, poor, uh, Sophie's blood.
[Eugene] With blunt force trauma,
the blood most likely will be the victim's blood.
translation.zh: ‎现场的血液最可能是被害者的

translation.en: [reporter 14] This morning, the body was removed from the scene…
translation.zh: ‎今早 尸体被带离了现场…

translation.en: [Dwyer] If there are no witnesses to a murder
and you've no DNA…
[officer 1] We'll be pulling out all the stops to get the person or persons who killed Sophie.
translation.zh: ‎想要破案抓人 难上加难

translation.en: …everything then is circumstantial evidence.
[man 8] Thanks again, and happy Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎再次感谢 祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: We had no experience of this.
We had no experience of serious crime at any level.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有任何重大犯罪的经验

translation.en: [Peter] The local guard, they were just local guys, you know?
translation.zh: ‎当地警卫 他们只是本地人 仅此而已

translation.en: They'd never witnessed anything like it.
What it did to them, you know,
translation.zh: ‎这对他们而言 可想而知

translation.en: I've heard of them crying themselves to sleep for three nights.
translation.zh: ‎我听说 他们哭了三个晚上

translation.en: [reporter 15] From everyone on Morning Ireland, a happy and peaceful Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎但是《爱尔兰早间新闻》播报的
‎只有快乐祥和的圣诞节

translation.en: [woman 5] My ex-husband and I were on holiday in Ireland
translation.zh: ‎1996年 我和我前夫当时在爱尔兰

translation.en: over Christmas and New Year's 1996.
One morning, he brought in the breakfast tray with The Irish Times.
translation.zh:
‎有一天早上 他把《爱尔兰时报》
‎和早餐一起端了进来

translation.en: This beautiful French woman on the front page
translation.zh: ‎这个美丽的法国女人就在封面上

translation.en: murdered in West Cork.
Isn't this awful?
I thought, "I'd like to know more about this woman."
[reporter 16] What can you tell us, Superintendent, about Sophie Toscan du Plantier?
translation.zh:
‎负责人 你能告诉我们
‎什么有关于苏菲的信息吗？

translation.en: [Smith from device] She's been visiting here for a few years,
bought this property.
She's a person who kept very much to herself.
translation.zh: ‎她是一个非常局限于自我的人

translation.en: [Frédéric in French] What was a married woman,
a mother,
doing all alone in Ireland at Christmas?
translation.zh: ‎圣诞节自己一个人在爱尔兰干嘛？

translation.en: [reporter 17] …the woman picked a home
that even by the standards of West Cork is extremely isolated.
translation.zh:
‎尽管按照西科克的标准来说
‎是与世隔绝的

translation.en: [reporter 18] …why she should decide to spend Christmas alone in West Cork
translation.zh: ‎…她为什么选择独自在西克科过圣诞

translation.en: when she had a child and a husband in France.
translation.zh:
‎她在法国明明有一个孩子
‎还有一个帅气的丈夫

translation.en: [Frédéric in French] She was a documentary producer.
Divorced.
She had her son, Pierre-Louis,
translation.zh: ‎她有一个儿子皮埃尔·路易斯

translation.en: and lived alone with him
before Daniel came into her life.
translation.zh: ‎那是在丹尼尔出现在她生命中之前

translation.en: Daniel Toscan du Plantier was a very big film producer,
translation.zh:
‎丹尼尔·托斯卡·杜普兰蒂埃
‎是一位知名的电影制作人

translation.en: very well-known.
[Agnès] Daniel was brilliant and intelligent…
and Sophie really liked that about him when they met.
They were on the same intellectual and creative level,
translation.zh: ‎他们的思想和创造力处于同一水平

translation.en: and they just clicked right away.
[Marie-Madeleine] He courted her very cleverly.
He invited us to a premiere.
Uh, we had the best seats.
He tried to win Sophie through her passions.
translation.zh: ‎他想用自己的热情追求苏菲

translation.en: But when Sophie married Daniel,
I cried. I didn't understand.
I've never cried at a wedding like I did at Sophie's.
translation.zh: ‎我从没像在苏菲的婚礼上那样哭过

translation.en: As if I felt something. Really.
As if I had a premonition.
I'm a woman who sometimes has premonitions.
[Bertrand] In Paris, she lived in a particular kind of world with Daniel.
translation.zh:
‎在巴黎时 她和丹尼尔
‎生活在一种特定的世界里

translation.en: And it wasn't Sophie's world.
[Marie-Madeleine in English] Every evening, they had people.
They were with people. They have to go out.
translation.zh: ‎他们和人们在一起 他们必须出门

translation.en: And Sophie didn't like that.
[in French] I always said there was an Alice in Wonderland quality to Sophie.
translation.zh:
‎我一直说苏菲有一种
‎爱丽丝梦游仙境的特质

translation.en: She liked to be alone,
especially given her husband's life.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是考虑到她丈夫的生活

translation.en: [Pierre-Louis] My mum didn't like glamour.
She always wanted to be private, authentic.
She needed an escape,
and Ireland was the perfect escape.
translation.zh: ‎而爱尔兰是完美的逃脱之地

translation.en: She wasn't Sophie Toscan du Plantier over there.
translation.zh:
‎在那里
‎她不是苏菲·托斯坎·杜布兰迪尔

translation.en: She was just Sophie.
[Lara in English] When she was a child, she lived with an Irish family for a time.
translation.zh:
‎她小时候和一家爱尔兰人
‎住过一段时间

translation.en: So she wanted a house in Ireland.
So she travelled down with her cousin.
translation.zh: ‎于是她和表弟一起旅行去了

translation.en: She says she'd hesitated between two houses.
translation.zh: ‎她说她在两栋房子之间犹豫了

translation.en: One was in peaceful Irish landscape of green rolling hills, sort of thing,
translation.zh: ‎一个在爱尔兰 风景如画 ‎美不胜收

translation.en: and the other was… She called it "violence."
And they found that house.
[in French] My daughter Alexandra didn't have a good feeling when they arrived.
translation.zh:
‎我女儿亚历山德拉来的时候
‎感觉不太好

translation.en: Very remote.
No light, no heating,
and there was a terrible wind
because the whole night, the shutters were banging like that.
translation.zh:
‎因为风的缘故
‎百叶窗整晚都在响

translation.en: Alexandra said, "You're not going to buy there."
translation.zh: ‎亚历山德拉说：“你不能买这里”

translation.en: "Don't buy there."
[Bertrand] If you really want to know Sophie,
just go to her house in Ireland.
The sun, the wind,
the rain,
all things that reflect her character.
translation.zh: ‎所有这些都能反映她的性格

translation.en: Tortured, calm, stormy, noise, wind.
You really have Sophie's spirit there.
[reporter 20 in English] Its wild beauty and remoteness
was what attracted Sophie du Plantier to the Mizen Peninsula.
translation.zh:
‎正是把苏菲·托斯坎·杜布兰迪尔
‎吸引到米曾角的原因

translation.en: [Frédéric in French] She was very cheerful, sunny, bright,
and at the same time, she had a very romantic side.
Not in the sentimental sense, but a black romanticism.
translation.zh: ‎不是感性 而是黑色浪漫主义

translation.en: [in English] The dark side.
[in French] Attracted by the morbid,
death,
monsters.
She had planned before she died to make a series about bodily fluids.
translation.zh:
‎她在去世前 计划好了准备制作一部
‎关于体液的纪录片

translation.en: That was her big project,
to make a series of films about
breast milk, blood, sperm, bile.
translation.zh: ‎母乳、血液、精子、胆汁的纪录片

translation.en: This sort of thing interested her a lot.
She had a very gothic side.
This gave her a sort of contrast.
It gave her depth.
A real depth.
[Lara in English] She was a talented writer,
and she wrote a great deal and with great affection about West Cork.
translation.zh:
‎她凭借自己对西科克的热爱
‎写出了很多的作品

translation.en: The most haunting passage I remember was she described a dead lamb
translation.zh: ‎我印象最深刻的一个文章写的是一个

translation.en: she'd seen on a path,
translation.zh: ‎她在路上看到的死亡的羊羔

translation.en: savaged by a fox.
Tufts of its fur were in the bushes around,
translation.zh: ‎灌木丛中都是一簇一簇的羊毛

translation.en: and she talked about how it was pulp,
the scalp of a body.
It gives me shivers now
because that's exactly what happened to her.
I mean, I don't want to get too fanciful about the whole thing.
translation.zh:
‎我是说我不想对整件事情
‎描述得太夸张

translation.en: I've tried to keep my eyes riveted on the facts,
translation.zh: ‎我试着让眼睛忠实于现实 不去想象

translation.en: but it was quite chilling to read that.
translation.zh: ‎但是在读到这些 我还是不寒而栗

translation.en: [Smith] Our investigation's progressing very steadily.
We are continuing our inquiries in France and locally in the Cork area.
translation.zh: ‎我们在法国和科克地区继续进行调查

translation.en: [Dwyer] In any murder case, and this is a tried and tested system,
translation.zh:
‎任何谋杀案的调查中
‎这种方法都是经受过考验和实战的

translation.en: you set up an incident room.
A team of 50 detectives has now been assembled to lead this investigation…
translation.zh: ‎组成一支有50名警员的调查组

translation.en: [Dwyer] Everything is studied and logged into this incident room.
translation.zh:
‎所有的信息都被研究
‎并记录在这间调查室

translation.en: [reporter 21] What's the current state of the investigation?
We are doing house-to-house visits, and we have extended questionnaires.
translation.zh:
‎我们要进行逐户探访
‎进行更详细的盘问记录

translation.en: [Dwyer] One of the things we always do
is generally referred to as house-to-house inquiries.
There's a special form you'll make out for it,
and our guards, who would know the people very well,
translation.zh: ‎调查的警卫对被人们非常了解

translation.en: they went to every house within ten miles and said "Where were you on that night
translation.zh: ‎他们去了16公里内的每个家庭 ‎“那晚你在哪里？

translation.en: between twelve o'clock and four o'clock in the morning? Where were you?"
translation.zh:
‎凌晨12点到早上4点之间？
‎你在哪里？”

translation.en: Two guards came up, asking us questions and various things.
translation.zh:
‎有两个警卫
‎问了我们问题还有一些事情

translation.en: I remember them coming to the house. Some Bantry boys came in.
translation.zh:
‎我记得他们来家里
‎有些班特里的人进来了

translation.en: Unless something happens specifically, most people would find it quite difficult
translation.zh: ‎除非有特殊情况 ‎这对大多数人来说 报告自己

translation.en: to tell you minute by minute, "What were you doing?"
translation.zh:
‎每分钟的踪迹 都很困难
‎“你当时在干什么？”

translation.en: If they wanna talk to me, they can talk to me.
translation.zh:
‎如果他们想跟我说话
‎他们可以跟我说话

translation.en: Unless you've got the… you know, a photographic memory.
translation.zh: ‎除非你有过目不忘的记忆力

translation.en: If you're telling the truth,
you've no problem.
If you're covering up, you tell lies.
translation.zh: ‎如果你遮遮掩掩 ‎你就在撒谎

translation.en: [Toma] When the Gardaí arrived to interview me,
translation.zh: ‎当爱尔兰卫队来询问我的时候

translation.en: they brought a photograph with them of Sophie,
and they said what did I think of this woman.
I said, "Yeah, very nice."
"No, but could she be a lesbian?"
[chuckling] It did kind of shock me.
I thought, "Is there any possibility
translation.zh: ‎我心想：“嫌疑人这个禽兽会不会

translation.en: that this monster was some lesbian?"
There was one guy living locally who had a predilection for spying on women
translation.zh:
‎有一个住在本地的男人
‎有暗中窥探女人的癖好

translation.en: and stealing gas canisters.
[Dwyer] Apparently, he used to go around knocking off tanks of gas.
translation.zh: ‎显然他以前经常四处偷煤气罐

translation.en: He was a small bit…
What's the word? He was a bit odd, the poor fella.
translation.zh: ‎怎么说呢？ ‎有点奇怪 又有点可怜

translation.en: It threw up all types of people like that.
translation.zh: ‎它把所有那种类型的人都涵盖了

translation.en: People acting not normal.
They've interviewed about a thousand people. They say…
translation.zh: ‎他们采访了大约一千人 说…

translation.en: It was just so much information.
[Barry] The Gardaí had identified a total of 54 suspects initially.
Quickly, that narrowed down to about ten, but one by one, they went through those.
translation.zh: ‎很快 通过逐一排查 缩小到大约10个

translation.en: [reporter 22 from device] …detectives led by Chief Superintendent Dermot Dwyer.
translation.zh:
‎…由侦探督察长德莫特·德怀尔
‎领导警员们

translation.en: The investigation is being taken very seriously.
[Ian] I was writing stories for the local papers
and one of the national papers.
There was one story I picked up.
A lady who lives at Three Castle Head called Yvonne Ungerer
translation.zh:
‎一个住在三塔城堡
‎叫伊冯·昂格尔的女人

translation.en: told me she had had a visit from the victim on the Sunday before
translation.zh:
‎告诉我 她在前一个周日
‎曾拜访过被害人

translation.en: and that… that Madame du Plantier said
that she'd had this really very strange experience.
[Wassell] There's a ruined castle
on Three Castle Head.
[in French] There she saw something terrible,
translation.zh: ‎她在这里目睹了非常可怕的事情

translation.en: and it scared her.
[Frédéric] And she felt
terrible fear.
[Marie-Madeleine] She arrived at the Ungerers' house really scared,
translation.zh: ‎她到安杰家的时候非常害怕

translation.en: saying, "Oh my God, I saw a woman."
translation.zh:
‎一直在说
‎“天哪 我看到了一个女人”

translation.en: Like a white shape.
[Wassell in English] Three Castle Head is meant to be haunted by a melancholy female ghost.
The White Lady.
[Frédéric in French] I learned this story about this lady,
translation.zh: ‎我听说了关于这位女士的故事

translation.en: this mythological, legendary character
who lives at this place on the lake.
And when you see her,
it means you are going to die in the hours that follow.
translation.zh:
‎意味着你会在
‎接下来的几个小时内死去

translation.en: [Marie-Madeleine] She didn't go to an Irish person's house.
An Irish person would never have let her leave.
translation.zh: ‎如果是爱尔兰人 绝不会让她离开

translation.en: [Wassell in English] If they'd known the legend,
translation.zh: ‎他们说 如果他们知道这个传说

translation.en: they wouldn't have let her go home.
But they didn't know.
[Bertrand in French] I remember when we arrived in Ireland.
translation.zh: ‎我记得我们到爱尔兰的时候 ‎我们在科克的一家酒店里

translation.en: We found ourselves in Cork, in a hotel,
on 25th December.
[Bertrand] All the Irish families were together celebrating Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎所有爱尔兰家庭都在一起庆祝圣诞节

translation.en: I think it was the morning of the 26th
that they called me and said, "You can come and see the body."
translation.zh:
‎他们打电话给我说：
‎“你可以过来看尸体”

translation.en: A big room, the morgue.
You cross the room. You see a coffin at the end.
translation.zh: ‎越过房间 尽头就是一个棺材

translation.en: You have to breathe.
You have to catch your breath and tell yourself, "Here we go."
translation.zh: ‎放稳呼吸 告诉自己 “开始吧”

translation.en: And the first time I saw Sophie, I didn't recognise her.
translation.zh: ‎我第一次看到苏菲时 我没认出她

translation.en: Uh… I didn't. It wasn't her.
What I noticed was her hands. And that her hands were so…
Thank God my sister didn't see her hands.
translation.zh: ‎谢天谢地 我妹妹没看到她的手

translation.en: [Georges] We were able to see Sophie's body.
[voice catches] Marguerite…
saw her.
She… she kissed her,
but she said, "This isn't my daughter." [sobs]
I'm sorry.
-[director in English] Set. Ready… -[beeps]
-Are you-- -[director] You're OK. You're fine.
translation.zh:
‎-你没事吧？
‎-没事的 你很好

translation.en: …today's murder is still ongoing and because the question--
translation.zh:
‎…今天谋杀案的调查仍在继续
‎因为还有个遗留问题…

translation.en: I'm sorry, everyone. I lost my eyeline.
translation.zh: ‎对不起各位 我看不到了

translation.en: [Florence] I can remember journalists from all walks of life.
translation.zh: ‎我记得来了形形色色的记者

translation.en: The media were very visible.
[Daniel in French] I went to Schull five or six days after the murder.
translation.zh:
‎（丹尼尔·卡朗
‎卢森堡电台 爱尔兰记者） ‎谋杀案发生后五、六天后
‎我到了斯科尔

translation.en: When journalists go somewhere new,
they go and see the local journalists.
A colleague called Eddie Cassidy told me,
translation.zh: ‎一个叫艾迪·凯瑟迪的同事告诉我

translation.en: "Ask for Ian Bailey."
[Ian in English] Because I was a local correspondent, the French press came in, came to me,
translation.zh:
‎因为我是当地记者
‎所以法国报社来的时候会来找我

translation.en: and various other news organisations.
[Daniel in French] He was clearly the best-informed journalist on the scene.
translation.zh: ‎他显然是现场消息灵通的记者

translation.en: He told me a little of what he knew.
translation.zh: ‎他跟我说了一些他知道的事

translation.en: He was extremely nice. Very helpful.
translation.zh: ‎他非常友善 非常有帮助

translation.en: [Ian in English] In another life, I was an investigative journalist in Britain.
translation.zh: ‎在英国 我是调查记者 ‎我报道了很多敏感的事件

translation.en: I did a lot of sensitive stuff.
I worked for The Sunday Times' Insight Team on stories to do with GCHQ.
translation.zh:
‎我在《周日时报》的洞察团队
‎报道有关英国政府通信总部的故事

translation.en: [in French] Suddenly, he found himself in the middle of a phenomenal story
translation.zh:
‎突然间 他发现自己
‎身处于一个非凡的故事当中

translation.en: in a place where nothing ever happens.
translation.zh: ‎在一个什么都没发生过的地方

translation.en: [in English] From my point of view, uh…
I was being very busy as an active freelance journalist.
translation.zh: ‎我是一个非常活跃的自由记者

translation.en: Writing articles, trying to make a living for myself.
I was picking up things in Schull,
getting on with my job as an investigative journalist.
[Daniel in French] He said, "Ask your French colleagues
translation.zh: ‎他说：“让你的法国同事去调查

translation.en: to investigate Sophie Toscan du Plantier's life."
[Ian in English] I genuinely felt that there was somebody in France
who had a vested interest in this.
translation.zh: ‎处于私人原因 对这个案件很感兴趣

translation.en: She's part of the French show business, so I think it's fascinating people.
translation.zh:
‎她是法国演艺圈的人士
‎我觉得她一定很迷人

translation.en: [Ian] But you can think something.
Can you prove it?
[reporter 23] Sophie du Plantier was married to a top French film producer.
translation.zh: ‎索菲嫁给了法国顶级制片人

translation.en: The couple were among the social elite in Paris.
translation.zh: ‎这对夫妇是巴黎的社会精英

translation.en: [in French] Daniel was a very big producer.
[Frédéric] He had produced for lots of big directors.
Antonioni,
Kurosawa,
Tarkovsky.
More than that, he was the embodiment of French cinema.
translation.zh: ‎更重要的是 他是法国电影界的化身

translation.en: He'd studied classics, Latin and Greek, so he was very cultured.
translation.zh:
‎他研习过经典著作 学习了拉丁文
‎和希腊文 所以他很有文化素养

translation.en: [Frédéric] He'd been the director of the biggest French studio.
translation.zh: ‎他曾是法国最大电影工作室的导演

translation.en: He was a public figure.
You would see him on TV.
…opera every 100 years, so this will be the last…
translation.zh:
‎…歌剧每百年出一次经典
‎所以这会是最后一个…

translation.en: [Frédéric] I've rarely met anyone so brilliant, so eloquent.
translation.zh: ‎我很少见到这么聪明、有口才的人

translation.en: [man 9] Daniel Toscan du Plantier was very well-known.
translation.zh: ‎丹尼尔·托斯卡·杜普兰蒂埃很有名

translation.en: He knew Jacques Chirac well,
who was the president of France at the time.
So he was very high-profile in France.
[Frédéric] But I had the impression that there were two Daniels.
That when the curtain fell, he was much more switched off,
translation.zh: ‎当幕布降落的时候 他就关闭了自己

translation.en: much more anxious, and quite silent.
I knew that Daniel had financial problems, that he wasn't in an easy situation.
translation.zh: ‎我知道丹尼尔有财务问题 ‎他的处境不轻松

translation.en: [Marie-Madeleine] When she died…
[in English] …Daniel said, "Don't speak to anybody." "I don't want to receive any journalists."
translation.zh:
‎丹尼尔说：“别跟任何人说
‎我不想接任何记者的采访”

translation.en: "I want to block everything."
And people thought, "Why did Daniel do that?"
translation.zh: ‎人们想：“丹尼尔为什么要这么做？”

translation.en: [in French] He didn't go to Ireland to identify the body. It was the family.
translation.zh:
‎他没有去爱尔兰确认尸体
‎是苏菲的家人去的

translation.en: We don't really know why he didn't come,
but it was extremely surprising.
When you find out that your wife has been murdered,
translation.zh: ‎当你发现妻子被谋杀的时候

translation.en: you go and deal with it.
[reporter 24] The people of Southwest Cork remain baffled.
translation.zh: ‎科克西南部的人民仍然困惑着

translation.en: The Gardaí still await a break.
translation.zh:
‎对于爱尔兰卫队来说 他们仍然在
‎等待一个契机

translation.en: [Barry] On 27th December,
this woman called Marie Farrell
was visited by Gardaí, given a questionnaire,
and one of the questions was, "Did you see Sophie Toscan du Plantier?"
translation.zh: ‎其中一个问题是 “你见没见过苏菲”

translation.en: And she said she'd been in her shop on Saturday 21st around three o'clock.
translation.zh:
‎她说周六21号大约3点时
‎苏菲来过店里

translation.en: When Sophie left the shop, she'd seen this man across the road
translation.zh:
‎当苏菲离开的时候
‎她看见一个男人穿过马路

translation.en: outside McCarthy Butchers on Main Street.
translation.zh: ‎就在主街麦克卡西肉铺那里

translation.en: Thought he looked a bit weird. Very long coat.
translation.zh: ‎他看起来很奇怪 穿着一个长外套 ‎（黑色长款外套）

translation.en: He was standing across the road from my shop,
and when she left the shop, he followed her down the street.
translation.zh: ‎当苏菲离开时 男人跟随她在街上走

translation.en: [Dwyer] He went from corner to corner, watching every place she went.
translation.zh: ‎从一个角落到另一个角落 ‎看着她去的每个地方

translation.en: Another word for it would be "stalking."
translation.zh: ‎描绘这现象的另一个词汇就是“跟踪”

translation.en: She didn't know who this guy was.
All these statements meant the Gardaí could trace
translation.zh: ‎通过这些描述 卫队可以

translation.en: the last-known movements of Sophie Toscan du Plantier.
[reporter 25] The last-known pictures of Sophie Toscan du Plantier
translation.zh:
‎索菲·托斯卡 纳·普兰蒂埃
‎最后的已知影像

translation.en: as she arrived in Cork Airport on December 20th.
translation.zh: ‎12月20日 她抵达科克机场时

translation.en: [Smith] We have a feeling there may be somebody out there
translation.zh: ‎我们有种感觉 可能有人跟踪她

translation.en: who has further information to give us,
translation.zh: ‎这个人可以为我们提供更多信息

translation.en: and for whatever reason is not coming forward at that stage.
translation.zh: ‎但是不知什么原因 调查停滞不前了

translation.en: [anchor 3] Hello again, and welcome back to the Crimeline studio.
translation.zh: ‎大家好 欢迎回到犯罪线工作室

translation.en: This following reconstruction traces what happened
from the time Sophie Toscan du Plantier arrived in Cork
until the morning…
[Anne] I was down in Schull, and it was all over the papers,
translation.zh: ‎我去了斯科尔 到处都在报道

translation.en: and quite a few people started to say, "You look so like Sophie."
A friend in film contacted me,
and he said, "These people are looking for somebody to do a reconstruction."
translation.zh:
‎他问：“这些人在找演员
‎来进行案件重现”

translation.en: [reporter 26] Sophie arrived at Cork Airport…
[Anne] Would I be interested?
I have no acting experience whatsoever.
I mean, it was watched by so many people.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 这会被很多人看到

translation.en: Thank you.
People still associate me with that.
translation.zh: ‎人们至今还把我和那个联系在一起

translation.en: There weren't any makeup artists.
What I had to do was put on a wig.
I thought, "Oh my God, this is so amateur and terrible," to be honest with you.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得：“天啊这 太业余了
‎太糟糕了” 我不骗你

translation.en: [reporter 26] She made some purchases in Brosnan's Spar supermarket.
translation.zh: ‎她在布罗斯南斯帕尔超市买了东西

translation.en: But I felt I was doing something positive.
[reporter 26] The next day, Sunday 22nd December, Sophie drove to Three Castle Head…
translation.zh:
‎第二天 12月22日周日
‎苏菲开车前去三塔城堡…

translation.en: …and walked for around an hour in this area.
translation.zh: ‎在这片区域散步了一个小时

translation.en: She then dropped in to Billy O'Sullivan's pub in Crookhaven.
translation.zh:
‎然后她去了比利·欧沙利文
‎在克鲁霍文的酒吧

translation.en: She had tea there and spoke to some people in the bar.
translation.zh: ‎她在那里喝茶 还和酒吧里的人聊天

translation.en: [Anne] I suppose the most difficult part was probably driving up to the house.
translation.zh:
‎我想最难的部分可能是
‎开车去房子那里

translation.en: Everything was still quite fresh.
[reporter 26] At six o'clock, lights were seen on in her house.
translation.zh:
‎六点钟的时候
‎有人看到她房子的灯打开了

translation.en: [Anne] And then to go into the house and know that three or four weeks ago
translation.zh: ‎然后走进屋里 去了解一个

translation.en: that this woman had come to her, um, her death in such a horrendous way.
translation.zh: ‎大概三、四周前惨死在这里的女人

translation.en: [reporter 26] What happened over the intervening hours remains a mystery.
translation.zh: ‎这段时间里发生的事情仍然是个谜

translation.en: [Anne] I felt a kindredness towards her.
That's the way I would see it.
I understood why she was down here,
translation.zh: ‎我明白她为什么来到这里居住

translation.en: exactly what she loved about it.
[Toma] A woman died here,
and we somehow all felt responsible for that.
But it didn't make sense to our experience of what West Cork was.
translation.zh:
‎按照我们在西科克的经验来说
‎这根本说不通

translation.en: Nobody really knew how we all fitted into that,
translation.zh: ‎没人知道我们都是怎么融入进来的

translation.en: how we thought about ourselves.
Twelve o'clock on Christmas Day, there's always a… a swim for charity.
translation.zh: ‎圣诞节的晚上十二点 ‎总会有慈善游泳的活动

translation.en: We always go down to the pier, and hundreds of people go down there,
translation.zh:
‎我们总是去码头那里
‎那里会有上百人到来

translation.en: and it's a social sort of event.
[Florence] The Christmas swim gets everyone together after Mass.
translation.zh:
‎圣诞游泳活动让人们
‎在弥撒过后重新聚集起来

translation.en: Obviously, everyone was aware of what was prevailing in the area
translation.zh: ‎显然大家都知道这里发生了什么

translation.en: but didn't quite grasp, actually, the enormity of what had happened.
translation.zh: ‎更准确说 这里发生的暴行

translation.en: I think everybody was coming to terms with it.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得大家都接受了这个事情

translation.en: [Len] The murder was part of the conversation down there.
And, uh, you start thinking about,
"God," you know, "there is somebody that can do this horrible thing."
translation.zh: ‎“上帝 真有人能做这种可怕的事”

translation.en: "Are they living around here?"
We were all afraid there was a murderer among us.
translation.zh: ‎我们都害怕 我们中间有杀人犯

translation.en: We were afraid of one another.
[Billy] People all around were scared.
You know, 'cause we never locked doors or anything.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 因为我们从来不锁门

translation.en: But people did lock doors.
translation.zh: ‎但是人们那天确实锁上了门

translation.en: [reporter 27] There's no denying
foreign nationals have been affected by the killing.
translation.zh: ‎外国人都受到了这个案件的影响

translation.en: I feel scared, yes.
It's taken some of the beauty away, hasn't it?
translation.zh: ‎谋杀也带走了这个地方的魅力

translation.en: [reporter 27] They dread to think anyone in such a close-knit area could've been involved.
translation.zh: ‎他们害怕自己亲密的人可能参与其中

translation.en: That changed that whole atmosphere. Definitely.
translation.zh: ‎这件事改变了整个城市氛围

translation.en: People were crawling through ideas of who were the weirdos.
translation.zh: ‎人们一直在想 谁是怪胎

translation.en: Who could this possibly be, this monster?
I was thinking about how everybody had made it "the other."
translation.zh: ‎我在想大家是怎么划分”其他人“的

translation.en: There were plenty of "others."
Blow-ins might have said, "It must have been
a repressed local farmer
who needed sex."
And locals might have said,
"Oh, it must have been one of those hippie dope-smoking ones
translation.zh: ‎“一定是那些嬉皮士大麻 烟鬼

translation.en: who needed sex."
The place is full of rumour and counter rumour,
translation.zh: ‎这里到处都是谣言和反的谣言

translation.en: and all sorts of theories have been bandied about.
translation.zh: ‎这些言论就是人们日常生活中的谈资

translation.en: In my mind, I was trying to think of neighbours
and various things and various people's lives.
translation.zh: ‎想一些事情 一些人的生活

translation.en: You know, trying to analyse everybody,
work out motives, and all sorts of stuff.
translation.zh: ‎找出作案动机以及各种可能

translation.en: People are afraid, yeah, that there's somebody out there.
translation.zh: ‎人们都很害怕 ‎这个人还逍遥法外

translation.en: If it's somebody living in the area, they might do it again.
translation.zh:
‎如果这个人住在这里
‎类似案件还会发生

translation.en: [woman 1] Don't let people into your home
unless you're satisfied as to their identification.
If you're suspicious, ring the Gardaí immediately.
translation.zh: ‎如果你怀疑的话 就打给卫队

translation.en: [Len] I did actually have a thought about somebody,
and it kept going on in my mind, and I couldn't stop it at all. I…
translation.zh: ‎我不断地去想 控制不住我自己 我…

translation.en: "Len, stop thinking about it. Stop thinking about it." you know?
translation.zh: ‎“伦恩 停止这些想法” 你明白吧？

translation.en: And in the end,
it was just playing on my mind. I went to the guards, and I told them.
translation.zh:
‎这些想法挥之不去
‎我把我的想法告诉了卫队

translation.en: I did feel really strange having thoughts about other people
you know, when you have no proof.
Your mind goes off into ridiculous places, you know,
and I wasn't the only person to behave like that.
[Smith] Sophie was murdered
between 11 p.m. on Sunday night and 10 a.m. the following morning.
translation.zh:
‎死亡时间是周日晚上11点到
‎第二天早上10点之间

translation.en: We would ask anybody who was driving a car on that night
translation.zh: ‎我们会问那天晚上开车的所有人

translation.en: to let us know if they saw anything unusual.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我们 他们有没有看到什么异常

translation.en: And then on 11th January, there was this major development in the case.
translation.zh: ‎后来在1月11日 案件有了重大进展

translation.en: [Barry] The Gardaí received a phone call from a call box
from a woman calling herself Fiona
saying she'd seen a man at Kealfadda Bridge
translation.zh: ‎说她凌晨3点的时候在科尔菲达桥

translation.en: around 3 a.m.
on the morning of the 23rd, when Sophie was murdered.
translation.zh: ‎就是23日 苏菲被谋杀那天的早晨

translation.en: Chief Superintendent Noel Smith made an appeal to Fiona to contact them.
translation.zh:
‎督察警长诺埃尔·史密斯
‎让菲奥娜联系他们

translation.en: Now, you particularly want to address yourself to somebody here.
translation.zh: ‎你现在一定想和这里的某人谈一谈

translation.en: The caller made a phone call to Bandon Garda Station.
That caller gave us certain information
which we think could be critical in… in solving this murder,
translation.zh: ‎这些信息可能是破案的关键

translation.en: and I am making a direct appeal to that person tonight to ring me here.
translation.zh:
‎今晚我们就请求这个人
‎把电话打到这里

translation.en: Please, if you're watching, or if you know who did make that phone call,
translation.zh: ‎如果你在看或者知道是谁打的电话

translation.en: do get in touch.
[Barry] She rang again the day afterwards
from a call box in Leap in West Cork, again using the alias Fiona.
translation.zh:
‎是从西科克市里普的一个电话亭
‎打来的 还是菲奥娜

translation.en: [Dwyer] When the Fiona thing started,
we thought, "Why doesn't she come forward?"
translation.zh:
‎我们疑惑
‎“她为什么不直接站出来？”

translation.en: "There must be a reason she doesn't come forward."
[Diane] She was married,
and she shouldn't have been there with another man.
translation.zh: ‎她不该和另一个男人在这里

translation.en: We were all telling her
that obviously this poor lady's life had gone,
translation.zh: ‎显然 这位可怜的女士的生命结束了

translation.en: you know, so she should give her statement
regardless of the consequences to herself.
translation.zh: ‎不再在乎这会为自己带来什么后果

translation.en: [Barry] And she rang again on the 24th,
third phone call as Fiona.
But on this occasion, she made it from her home phone in Schull.
translation.zh:
‎但这次不同
‎她用的是斯科尔家中的电话

translation.en: Gardaí traced it.
Fiona was Marie Farrell.
[producer] What did you see on the night of 23rd December?
translation.zh: ‎12月23日晚上 你看到了什么？

translation.en: I was driving from Goleen to Schull,
translation.zh: ‎我当时从戈琳开车去斯科尔

translation.en: and I saw a man walking along the bridge, just along here.
he appeared to be in a drunken state and waving his arms around.
translation.zh: ‎他看起来像是喝醉了 挥舞着手臂

translation.en: She said he was wearing a long, black coat and looking up at the sky,
translation.zh:
‎她描述这个男人穿着黑色长褂
‎抬头看着天空

translation.en: and he was totally dishevelled and seemed to be out of it.
translation.zh: ‎他看起来衣冠不整 神智也不清醒

translation.en: All the things of somebody that has totally and utterly lost it.
[Barry] But then she was in Brosnan's supermarket in Schull later in January,
translation.zh: ‎然后她在一月底去了布鲁斯诺的超市

translation.en: and she saw the man again.
[producer] "Oh my God, that's the man I saw on the road."
translation.zh: ‎”天啊 这是我那天路上看到的男人“

translation.en: I would've said that to myself.
I went into the shop. I bent down to get the paper.
I looked up, and there he was.
I dropped the paper and left the shop
translation.zh: ‎我放下了纸 然后离开商店

translation.en: because I knew the guards were in the street.
[Barry] She'd seen this man at Kealfadda Bridge
translation.zh:
‎苏菲被害那晚
‎她在科尔菲达桥看到了这个男人

translation.en: the night Sophie was murdered and said, "That's the man."
translation.zh:
‎苏菲被害那晚
‎她在科尔菲达桥看到了这个男人 ‎然后说：“就是他”

translation.en: When I pointed the man out to the Gardaí,
translation.zh: ‎当我给卫队指认这个人的时候

translation.en: they told me
that his name was Ian Bailey.
